parameters: <ActiveMessage:\C[1]■Event■>
\N<Irime>Hey, Segi. How are you feeling...?

\N<Segi>Irime-san... Nothing's changed particularly, but is
something the matter...?

\N<Irime>No, it's just... Well, if nothing's changed, that's good. It
was unnecessary worry on my part, haha...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Irime>...Is there really something wrong? If it's okay with you,
why don't you talk about it? It might help you feel a bit
better?

\N<Irime>That Zuuteruka did something to you... I see. So that's what
happened...

\N<Segi>...I'm sorry, even though you were concerned about me, I
lied saying nothing had changed...
\N<Irime>It's alright. It's not something you can easily talk about.

\N<Irime>Besides... I mean, I understand how you feel. No, with Yuia-
san not here, I might be the only one in this town who truly
understands your feelings.
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Irime>Somehow I've managed to make it through the training
sessions. But you see, I've had my fair share of troubles
too.

\N<Irime>If you only walk on safe and smooth roads, you won't reach
your destination. Sometimes you have to take risks and move
forward even if it's dangerous.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Irime>That's why... I understand your feelings the best. I also
understand that it was a choice you had to make.
\N<Segi>Irime-san...
A

\N<Irime>Somehow, I've managed to make it through the training
sessions. But you know, I've had my fair share of troubles
too.

\N<Irime>If you only walk on flat and safe paths, you won't reach
your destination. Sometimes you have to take risks and move
forward, even if it's dangerous.
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■Event■>
\N<Segi>Irime-san...
\N<Irime>...What's the matter? You look so serious.
\N<Segi>No, it's nothing...

\N<Irime>You're still at it this late? Preparing for the training
session?

\N<Segi>Yes. Someone with as little combat experience as me can
never be too prepared.

\N<Irime>That's true for both of us. Let's make sure we do our best
without any regrets.

\N<Irime>Ah... wait a minute. What are you holding there? That...
strange sticky thread?

\N<Segi>Oh, this... I found it in the ruins. I don't know what it
is, but I thought it might be useful for something.
\N<Irime>Can I take a look at that?
\N<Segi>Yes, here you go.

\N<Irime>Hmm... Regardless of what this actually is, it might indeed
prove to be useful.

\N<Irime>But it's no good as it is. We need to process it to make it
usable as a tool.
\N<Segi>What do you mean?

\N<Irime>Remember our conversation the other day? About using
something to immobilize Fubii. Maybe we can use this
stickiness to our advantage...
\N<Segi>Ah...

\N<Irime>But as I said, it's useless in its current state. It needs
to be processed before it can be of any use... If only there
was someone in town who could perform such a feat.
\N<Segi>Process it to make it usable as a tool...
B

\N<Irime>But this won't do as it is. It needs to be processed further
to be of any use... If only there was someone in this town
capable of such a feat.
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■Event■>

\N<Rame>I'm scared... that Mama will go off to fight again... and
that I can't do anything about it.

\N<Rame>I'm not good at fighting, but now I think I understand, even
if just a little, how Riia-chan felt when he said he wanted
to become stronger quickly...
A

\N<Rame>I'm scared... I'm scared of Mama going off to fight again...
and that I can't do anything about it.

\N<Rame>I'm not good at fighting, but now I think I understand, even
if just a little, why Riia-chan wanted to become stronger so
quickly...
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■Event■>

\N<Rame>Fubii... ever since he arrived, it seems like the atmosphere
among the boys at the training grounds has changed.

\N<Rame>What on earth does he want to do...? I don't think it has
anything to do with me or Riia-chan though...
B

\N<Rame>Fubii... Ever since he arrived, it seems like the atmosphere
among the boys at the training grounds has changed.

\N<Rame>What on earth does he want to do...? I don't think it has
anything to do with me or Riia-chan though...
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■Event■>

\N<Irime's Husband>Hey, Segi-san... did you come to visit me? I'm sorry... for
being in such a state...
\N<Segi>No... don't worry about that. How are you feeling?

\N<Irime's Husband>Not too bad, but still... I've been seriously ill, and as
you can see, I can't move around freely.

\N<Irime's Husband>That's why, swallowing my pride, I want to ask you for a
favor... about my wife. About Irime...

\N<Irime's Husband>She's concerned about me and always tries to act strong, but
she's a woman with a fragile core. Yet I literally can't
support her or be the strength she needs...

\N<Irime's Husband>That's why, especially now... I want you, someone I trust,
to be there for her in my stead.
\N<Segi>...Understood. If I can be of any help, then certainly.
\N<Irime's Husband>Thank you... hearing those words puts me at ease.

\N<Irime's Husband>Not knowing what will become of my wife and daughter... and
the future of this town... it's frustrating to be so
powerless.

\N<Segi>Please don't worry about that and focus on your recovery.
Surely that's what's best for Irime-san and everyone else.
\N<Irime's Husband>...Thank you. You are a kind-hearted woman...
A
\N<Irime's Husband>...Thank you. You are a kind-hearted woman...
